book.title: Bob Steele In Strange Waters or, Aboard a Strange Craft
book.description: 简介： We are in St. Georges Bay, ten miles from the port of Belize, British Honduras. Two days ago, while we were well out in the gulf, I opened the letter containing the first part of my sealed orders. Those orders, as you know, sent us to Belize. Before...
